titleStmt.title: His Majesties message sent by the Lord Chamberlain to the House of Peers, the 28. of December. 1641.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: With engraving of royal seal of Charles I at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
